pages.text: Universal Cables are Mekanism's way to transfer power. They are capable of transferring Mekanism's power Joules (J), as well as a variety of other power types such as Forge Energy (FE), Thermal Expansion's Redstone Flux (RF), Buildcraft's Minecraftjoules (MJ - display only), and Industrialcraft Energy Unit (EU). This flexibility allows players to mix power generation from

different mods while still only using one type of cabling. Neat.$(p)Like other transmission pipes, they can be configurated to be Push, Pull, None, or Normal by $(k:sneak) + right clicking on the connected bits with a $(l:item/tools/configurator)Configurator$(/l).

$(bold)Redstone Sensitivity$(br)$()By right clicking on a Pressurized Tube with a $(l:item/tools/configurator)Configurator$(/l), you can toggle Redstone Sensitivity on/off. When toggled $(bold)on$(), the Pressurized Tube will interact with redstone signals. If the Pressurized Tube is in contact with an active redstone signal, it will disconnect from any surrounding blocks/tubes. It stays this way until the redstone signal is gone. By default, Redstone Sensitivity is toggled off.
